Package com.googlecode.kevinarpe.papaya.filesystem

Classes for File and the file system

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PathFilter
    Extends FileFilter to add getDepth parameter to PathFilter.accept(File, int).
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseTraversePathIter
    Based class for TraversePathIterable and TraversePathIterator to provide read-only access to its attributes.
    DirectoryListing
    Replaces File.listFiles().
    FileFilterUtils
    Utilities for interface FileFilter
    PathFilterUtils
    Utilities for interface PathFilter.
    TraversePathIterable
    Builder class for TraversePathIterator.
    TraversePathIterator
    Traverses a directory hierarchy similar to the UNIX command line tool find.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    FileType
    Classification for files: FileType.NORMAL_FILE and FileType.DIRECTORY.
    TraversePathDepthPolicy
    Controls how a directory tree is traversed: depth-first or depth-last.
    TraversePathExceptionPolicy
    How to handle exceptions thrown when retrieving directory listings.

Package com.googlecode.kevinarpe.papaya.filesystem Description

Classes for File and the file system

This package is a part of the open-source Papaya library.
